title: Clearview AI, Used by Police to Find Criminals, Now in Public Defenders’ Hands
description: After a Florida man was accused of vehicular homicide, his lawyer used Clearview AI’s facial recognition software to prove his innocence. But other defense lawyers say Clearview’s offer rings hollow.

title: How Russian Trolls Helped Keep the Women’s March Out of Lock Step
description: As American feminists came together in 2017 to protest Donald Trump, Russia’s disinformation machine set about deepening the divides among them.

title: Will Smith’s ‘Emancipation’: What Will Apple Do?
description: The Civil War drama “Emancipation” finished filming early this year. Now, Apple faces a quandary on what to do with the movie.
